   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Simple RSS Status's documentation!
=============================================

Here's a lot background. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RSS

Here's the core user story:

   As a journalist, I want to observe a number of RSS feeds and note the daily changes
   so I can track changes as breaking news.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   approach
   architecture
   expansion
